content.question: Which of the following best explains why Congress has used its power to help certain types of businesses obtain federal contracts, as shown in the table?

choices.label: Congress is attempting to find ways to decrease overall federal expenditures.
Congress is ensuring that the bureaucracy is accountable to groups other than large corporations.
Congress is using block grants to help the states have access to government contracts.
Congress is using its legislative power to reorganize the federal bureaucracy.

content.answer: Congress is ensuring that the bureaucracy is accountable to groups other than large corporations.
